lead_paragraph: Australia's bad boys of tennis Nick Kyrgios and Bernard Tomic have been named in the Davis Cup squad for the World Group playoff against Slovakia after bowing out of the U.S. Open in typical controversy.

headline.print_headline: Australian Bad Boys Kyrgios, Tomic in Davis Cup Squad
headline.main: Australian Bad Boys Kyrgios, Tomic in Davis Cup Squad
